flawed_nl_solution:
She needs to type an additional 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=790>>790 words.
In one minute she can type 300 words / 30 = <<300/30=10>>10 words.
It will take her 790 / 10 = <<790/10=79>>79 more minutes to finish typing the report.
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 790. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
